meanings.definition: A group of dinosaurs characterized by their hip structure, including theropods and sauropodomorphs.
meanings.sent1: The saurischians were known for their unique hip bones.
meanings.sent2: Paleontologists study saurischians to learn more about ancient creatures.
meanings.sent3: The saurischians had a hip party, and all the other dinosaurs were jealous.
meanings.sent4: In the world of dinosaurs, saurischians were the hip trendsetters.
meanings.sent5: The saurischians' hip structure set them apart from other dinosaur groups.
